name: Guardromon_(Gold)
description: Guardromon (Gold) has an armored body that is made of solid golden iron. It also has rocket jets mounted on its back. In Digimon World: Next Order and Digimon Story: Cyber Sleuth - Hacker's Memory its missiles are silver rather than gold, its eyes are gold rather than green, and some of its parts are a dark shade of gold rather than silver or the same gold as the rest of its body.
